posts.post_content:
Posted By: David Seaborn
My wife and I have been blessed with the arrival of twin girls.  While this has pleased me to no end, I've decided to sell what I feel is one of the nicest 19th Century baseball cards I've ever owned.  The resolution and contrast are incredible.  Take a look at the scan provided.  

I will be venturing out a bit trying an auction format here on the BST, similar to what Leon has used in the past.  The auction will start at $6,500.  Bidding can be in any $100 increment over the current bid.  The current bid price will be raised $100 over the 2nd highest bid, just like if this were on eBay.  You may post your bid here or email me if you wish to remain private.  I will regularly update this page with the current bid.  The auction can end at any time if I receive an offer of $14,000 cash or cash/trade equivalent that I accept.  The initial phase of the auction will end at 1:00 PM EST on Sunday, August 3rd.  At that time the high bidder will win the card if 15 additional minutes go by without a new, higher bid.  If there is a new bid, the 15 minute clock restarts.  I will post any private bid amounts received via email on that day to keep this page current.

The winning bid price includes insurance and shipping through USPS reigstered mail.  Most of you know me, if not please feel free to contact Leon (or any other hobby reference), or take a look at my eBay feedback (id= oldoriole).  Please feel free to email me with a bid or with any additional questions (oldorioles@aol.com).  Thanks again, Dave Seaborn
  

[IMG]http://img128.imageshack.us/img128/2271/n370lonejackbushongsgc5yr8.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Al C.risafulli
Wow, that is gorgeous.

-Al

Posted By: David Seaborn
New post to reflect auction format starting right now and running for eight days through August 3rd, 1 PM (see rules above).  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: David Seaborn
We have the first bid.  Current bid is $6,500 so the next bid must be at least $100 higher than that.  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: Anthony S.
That is one awesome card.

Posted By: David Seaborn
The new current bid is $7,300.  The next bid must be at least $7,400.  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: David Seaborn
The current high bid is $7,600.  The next bid must be at least $7,700.  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: David Seaborn
The current bid is now $7,800.  The next bid must be at least $7,900.  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: David Seaborn
The current bid is now $8,000.  The next bid must be at least $8,100.  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: David Seaborn
OK, as soon as we go 15 more minutes without a bid the card will be sold.

Posted By: David Seaborn
Card is now sold, thanks everybody!  Dave

Posted By: Fred C
Congratulations to the high bidder.  That is about as nice an image as one could expect for a Lone Jack.

Posted By: John Wondowski
Dave,

Please email your contact information to me.

thanks,

John
